subject: Move CORS configuration to vercel.json for zero-config deploys
body:
CORS headers are now handled at the Vercel infrastructure level via
vercel.json, so the API works automatically on deploy from GitHub
without needing ALLOWED_ORIGINS env var. Handlers still respond to
OPTIONS preflight with 204. Deleted the in-code cors.ts module.
